actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry (Subsequently: Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry)
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry (Subsequently: Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry).

official_title: A bill directing the Secretary of Agriculture to convey the property comprising the Lee Canyon Youth Camp, Toiyabe National Forest, Nev., to Clark County, Nev.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey the property comprising the Lee Canyon Youth Camp, Toiyabe National Forest, Nevada, to Clark County, Nevada.

titles.title: A bill directing the Secretary of Agriculture to convey the property comprising the Lee Canyon Youth Camp, Toiyabe National Forest, Nev., to Clark County, Nev.
